<a id="AudioEffectAmplify"></a>

# AudioEffectAmplify

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Adds an amplifying audio effect to an audio bus.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Increases or decreases the volume being routed through the audio bus.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio buses](../tutorials/audio/audio_buses.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffectAmplify_property_volume_db"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **volume_db** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectAmplify_property_volume_db)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_volume_db**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_volume_db**\ (\ )

Amount of amplification in decibels. Positive values make the sound louder, negative values make it quieter. Value can range from -80 to 24.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectAmplify_property_volume_linear"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **volume_linear** [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectAmplify_property_volume_linear)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_volume_linear**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_volume_linear**\ (\ )

Amount of amplification as a linear value.

\ **Note:** This member modifies [volume_db](AudioEffectAmplify.md#AudioEffectAmplify_property_volume_db) for convenience. The returned value is equivalent to the result of [@GlobalScope.db_to_linear()](@GlobalScope.md#@GlobalScope_method_db_to_linear) on [volume_db](AudioEffectAmplify.md#AudioEffectAmplify_property_volume_db). Setting this member is equivalent to setting [volume_db](AudioEffectAmplify.md#AudioEffectAmplify_property_volume_db) to the result of [@GlobalScope.linear_to_db()](@GlobalScope.md#@GlobalScope_method_linear_to_db) on a value.
